How to Import my Notes into Cramify

Importing your notes into Cramify is fairly easy but can be challenging without knowing Dokuwiki formating.

  1. Export your notes into either HTML, DOCX, PDF format. In my experience, HTML and DOCX works best.
  1. Head over to the corresponding website for your file format.
    1. For HTML: https://www.vertopal.com/en/convert/html-to-dokuwiki
    2. For DOCX: https://www.vertopal.com/en/convert/docx-to-dokuwiki
    3. For PDF: https://www.vertopal.com/en/convert/pdf-to-dokuwiki

3. Convert your notes. You will download a file with the tag “.dokuwiki”, drag this file into your browser, you’ll see a bunch of text, just copy all of it (CTRL+A then CTRL+C) and paste it into the Cramify Document.

Other: If you can’t get it working email me (found at Help) with you notes and what credit you want and I can do it through my end
